projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Expected response sound is not detected on button click.(Kitchensink > Controls > Button states)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Press buttons B1 and B2

Expected result
After step 1: Should hear sound response (click) on each button

Actual Result:
No sound response is found on each button click.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink - Expected response sound is not detected on button click.
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium SDK-2.0.2.v20120505151714
Tested with Titanium Studio:2.0.2.201205041518
Platform & version: Android v 2.2
Device Details: LG-p970(Android v 2.2)
Host Operating System: OSX 10.7.3
